snippet: Rafael Nadal has pulled out of the Aegon championships at Queen's Club, the traditional Wimbledon warm-up event, due to the wrist injury that forced the Spaniard to leave the French Open last week....
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal has pulled out of the Aegon championships at Queen's Club, the traditional Wimbledon warm-up event, due to the wrist injury that forced the Spaniard to leave the French Open last week.

headline.print_headline: Nadal Pulls Out of Queen's Due to Wrist Injury
headline.main: Nadal Pulls Out of Queen's Due to Wrist Injury
